label: Printing and Design Services
description: Services related to printing and design, including equipment, supplies, and promotional materials.
intents: Print marketing materials for a business
Print personal items such as t-shirts or posters

subcategories.label: Printing Equipment
subcategories.description: Machines and tools used for printing and related tasks.

subcategories.label: Printed Materials
subcategories.description: Physical items that are printed on, such as paper, posters, and labels.

subcategories.label: Promotional Materials
subcategories.description: Items used for marketing and advertising purposes, such as business cards and flyers.

subcategories.label: Design Services
subcategories.description: Services related to graphic design and custom printing.
